game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: You are on a quest to find the lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and follow clues to locate the treasure.

task.description: Visit the old library and search for clues to find the map leading to the treasure.
Decipher the ancient symbols on the treasure map to determine the location of the treasure.
Battle the guardian of the treasure to prove your worth and claim the treasure as your own.
